result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Sandy M Yang not in court.  Attorney Aneeq Ahmad in court for Sandy M Yang.  Attorney Matthew Richard Westphal in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for final pretrial.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date.  Case adjourned for calendar call/final pretrial in Branch 40.
Calendar call scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed:  Defendant's Motion to Adjourn Trial
Received and Filed.

Received and Filed:  State's Proposed Jury Instructions.

Defendant Sandy M Yang appeared by video.  Attorney Aneeq Ahmad appeared by video for Sandy M Yang.  Attorney Matthew Richard Westphal appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status conference.  Defense requests more time to review case. Court set final pretrial and jury trial dates.  Defense acknowledges receipt of discovery.  Court ordered all substantive motions to be filed by 9-30-2022 and all responses to be filed by 10-28-2022 or they will be deemed waived.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Sandy M Yang in court with Attorney Aneeq Ahmad.  Matthew Richard Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a8cc2343-9b62-c309-778f-fa846faecb6a.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Status conference scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Scheduling conference scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Aneeq Ahmad in court.  Matthew Richard Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Both parties appear in person.

This case was transferred to Branch 28, Hon. Judge M. Sanders in error.
Case should be assigned to a general felony calendar.
Clerk of Circuit Court Criminal Division Substitution Desk was contacted to determine the court branch.

Case is adjourned for scheduling conference in Branch 40.

Defendant Sandy M Yang in court with Attorney Aneeq Ahmad; both appear by video.    Student Intern Kyle Elderkin under the supervision of Matthew Westphal appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Sanders, Branch 28.   Original Information received and filed.  Copy given to Defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant was arraigned in open court and pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 28.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
